mapper.select: select book_no , book_title , book_isbn --ISBN 번호 , book_author --저자 이름 , book_public --출판사 , book_price --가격 , book_image --책 표지 , book_contents --책 내용 , book_inputdate --출판일자 , book_stock --책 재고량 , book_reward --책 추천수 from Book_info where book_no = #{book_no}

select count(*) from book_info
where book_title like '%' || #{searchText} || '%'

select book_no , book_title , book_author , book_contents , book_image , book_price , book_public from book_info
where book_title like '%' || #{searchText} || '%'
order by book_no desc

select book_no , book_title , book_author , book_contents , book_image , book_price , book_public from book_info
where book_title like '%' || #{bookname} || '%' or book_author like '%' || #{bookname} || '%'
order by book_no desc
